Summary: Flew slow, slow pulse of lights, zigzag, red/blue/purple/white.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were driving home on the 55fwy when we first noticed it, then we ended up following it and video taping while we were driving home on Tustin Avenue, made a right on Walnut Avenue and we pulled over and kept video taping.. it was very strange.. we have the video
